description: More markets for the Ligue 2 game, scheduled for March 6 at 2:00 PM ET.

markets.description:
In the upcoming Ligue 2 game, scheduled for March 6 at 2:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "AS Nancy-Lorraine" if AS Nancy-Lorraine win the game by 2 or more goals.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Montpellier HSC".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

This market will resolve according to the official final score published on ligue2.fr. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

The primary resolution source for this market is the official statistics of the event as recognized by the governing body or event organizers. However, if the governing body or event organizers have not published final match statistics within 2 hours after the event's conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead.

markets.description:
In the upcoming Ligue 2 game between AS Nancy-Lorraine and Montpellier HSC, scheduled for March 6 at 2:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if AS Nancy-Lorraine and Montpellier HSC combine to score 2 or more goals in this game.

If the combined total is less than 2, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

If the game is started but not completed, this market will resolve according to the official final score published on ligue2.fr. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

The primary resolution source for this market is the official statistics of the event as recognized by the governing body or event organizers. However, if the governing body or event organizers have not published final match statistics within 2 hours after the event's conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead.

markets.description:
In the upcoming Ligue 2 game between AS Nancy-Lorraine and Montpellier HSC, scheduled for March 6 at 2:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Yes" if both AS Nancy-Lorraine and Montpellier HSC each score at least one goal during the game.

This market will resolve to "No" if either team fails to score (i.e., if one or both teams finish with zero goals).

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

If the game is started but not completed, this market will resolve according to the official final score published on ligue2.fr. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

The primary resolution source for this market is the official statistics of the event as recognized by the governing body or event organizers. However, if the governing body or event organizers have not published final match statistics within 2 hours after the event's conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead.
